overview: Renata decides to change her life after surprising her husband, Antonio, godfather of a mafia, in the arms of a maid. But he hasn't said his last word! When he realizes that his wife has left with his address book that could bring down all the big names linked to his organization, he launches an agent after her. However, the beautiful woman doesn't stay alone for long, and quickly finds company in the neighbouring villages. She thus lets herself be transported according to her desires, her partners and especially far away from her former luxurious life...
title: Rebels
